name: UIFontPickerViewControllerDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods for receiving messages about the userâ€™s interaction with the font picker.

items.name: func fontPickerViewControllerDidCancel(UIFontPickerViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user dismissed the font picker without selecting a font.

items.name: func fontPickerViewControllerDidPickFont(UIFontPickerViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user has selected a font.
